org.sql: SELECT issues.* FROM issues INNER JOIN issue_statuses ON issue_statuses.id = issues.status_id INNER JOIN trackers ON trackers.id = issues.tracker_id INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id INNER JOIN enumerations ON enumerations.id = issues.priority_id AND enumerations.type IN ('IssuePriority') WHERE issues.author_id IN (SELECT users.id FROM users LEFT OUTER JOIN custom_values ON custom_values.customized_type = 'Principal' AND custom_values.customized_id = users.id AND custom_values.custom_field_id = 42 WHERE custom_values.value IN ('Foo') AND 1 = 1)

rewrites.sql: SELECT issues.* FROM issues INNER JOIN issue_statuses ON issue_statuses.id = issues.status_id INNER JOIN trackers ON trackers.id = issues.tracker_id INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id WHERE issues.author_id IN (SELECT users.id FROM users LEFT OUTER JOIN custom_values ON custom_values.customized_type = 'Principal' AND custom_values.customized_id = users.id AND custom_values.custom_field_id = 42 WHERE custom_values.value IN ('Foo') AND 1 = 1)

SELECT issues.* FROM issues INNER JOIN issue_statuses ON issue_statuses.id = issues.status_id INNER JOIN trackers ON trackers.id = issues.tracker_id INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = issues.project_id WHERE issues.author_id IN (SELECT users.id FROM users INNER JOIN custom_values ON custom_values.customized_type = 'Principal' AND custom_values.customized_id = users.id AND custom_values.custom_field_id = 42 WHERE custom_values.value IN ('Foo') AND 1 = 1)
